provisions.title: Article 36 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 03/08/2017 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) MUREKEZI Anastase Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General Gazette nº Special of 18/08/2017 PRIME MINISTER’S ORDER N° 105/03 OF 17/08/2017 ON AUTOMATICALLY REMOVING FROM OFFICE DIRECTOR GENERAL TABLE OF CONTENTS

provisions.title: Article 2 - Authorities responsible
provisions.content: for implementation of this Order The Minister of Public Service and Labor and the Minister of Finance and Economic Planning are Gazette nº Special of 18/08/2017 entrusted with the implementation this Order.

provisions.title: Article 4 - Commencement
provisions.content: Gazette nº Special of 18/08/2017 PRIME MINISTER’S ORDER N° 105/03 OF 17/08/2017 ON AUTOMATICALLY REMOVING FROM OFFICE DIRECTOR GENERAL The Prime Minister, Pursuant to the Constitution of the Republic of Rwanda of 2003 revised in 2015, especially in Articles 119, 120, 121 and 176; Pursuant to Law n° 86/2013 11/09/2013 establishing the general statutes for public service, especially in Articles 40, 41, 44, 93 and 95; Having considered the Letter 1303/03.5 of 14/12/2016 from the Office of the Prime Minister suspending Ms. KABERUKA UWINEZA Chantal from the post Director General of ICT from 13/12/2016 as a result of job discontinuance after the Office the Prime Minister restructuring; ORDERS:

provisions.title: Article 1 - Automatic removal
provisions.content: Ms KABERUKA UWINEZA Chantal who was Director General of ICT in the Office of the Prime Minister is automatically removed from office due to job discontinuance.

provisions.title: Article 3 - Repealing provision
provisions.content: All prior legal provisions contrary this Order are repealed.
